name: part_007
file: tmp_【HOPE TO THE FUTURE 3D LIVE】 IRyS 2024 Birthday Live! #IRySBDay [cc5SQqswwMM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: A group performance of the song 'Rising Hope' by IRyS and her JP senpais.
An MC section where IRyS reflects on the guest medley and introduces the next song in a church setting.
A solo performance of the song 'DEAD OR ALIVE' by IRyS in the church.

subtitles.original: 思いもよらない 日に輝く 出来事でしょう
subtitles.english: It must be an event that shines on an unexpected day.

subtitles.original: Whoa!
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: 築き上げてきた 理想の世界 言わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: The ideal world I've built up—I have to say it.

subtitles.original: 君がくれた思いの 全部を信じて
subtitles.english: Believing in all the feelings you gave me.

subtitles.original: 行ける それが嘘か どうかなんて 分からなくてもいい
subtitles.english: I can go, even if I don't know whether it's a lie or not.

subtitles.original: 誰かが示す 見本てなんだっけ 普通の愛てなんだっけ
subtitles.english: What was that "example" someone showed me? What was "normal love" again?

subtitles.original: 僕は 今日も 僕に問いかけ
subtitles.english: Today, once again, I ask myself.

subtitles.original: 追いかけ 旅路で手に入れるのは 変わらない真実
subtitles.english: What I'll obtain at the end of my journey is the unchanging truth.

subtitles.original: 僕は要らない まだ見ぬ未来が あるから
subtitles.english: I don't need it, because there's a future I haven't seen yet.

subtitles.original: 孤独なんて 消えてなくなって 逃げること嫌になって
subtitles.english: Loneliness has vanished, and I've grown tired of running away.

subtitles.original: 新しい 今日を探すんだよ
subtitles.english: I'll search for a new "today".

subtitles.original: この願い例え魔法がなくたって 叶えなきゃ誓った
subtitles.english: I swore to grant this wish, even without magic.

subtitles.original: 僕と君で作れる未来なら もう近い
subtitles.english: If it's a future we create together, it's already close.

subtitles.original: 僕の右手 君の左手 そっとつないで
subtitles.english: Gently joining my right hand with your left.

subtitles.original: 握ったメッセージ That's rising hope
subtitles.english: The message I've gripped tight—That's rising hope!

subtitles.original: 離さないから That's rising hope
subtitles.english: I'll never let go—That's rising hope!

subtitles.original: I will believe it! Rising Hope!
subtitles.english: I will believe it! Rising Hope!

subtitles.original: Hey! Don't let it go!
subtitles.english: Hey! Don't let it go!

subtitles.original: Can you continue?
subtitles.english: Can you continue?

subtitles.original: Alright, make my way!
subtitles.english: Alright, make my way!

subtitles.original: Phew!
subtitles.english: Phew!

subtitles.original: And I'm back!
subtitles.english: And I'm back!

subtitles.original: HiRyS, it's IRyS!
subtitles.english: HiRyS, it's IRyS!

subtitles.original: Anyways...
subtitles.english: Anyways...

subtitles.original: How did you guys like Rising Hope?
subtitles.english: How did you guys like Rising Hope?

subtitles.original: It was amazing, right?
subtitles.english: It was amazing, right?

subtitles.original: Or more like, how did you guys enjoy the full guest medley?
subtitles.english: Or more like, how did you guys enjoy the full guest medley?

subtitles.original: It was a whole medley!
subtitles.english: It was a whole medley!

subtitles.original: I sang so many songs with so many of my wonderful JP senpais.
subtitles.english: I sang so many songs with so many of my wonderful JP senpais.

subtitles.original: Once again, thank you so much to my JP senpais for accepting my invitation...
subtitles.english: Once again, thank you so much to my JP senpais for accepting my invitation...

subtitles.original: ...and for singing with me.
subtitles.english: ...and for singing with me.

subtitles.original: And at the end, I really wanted to sing Rising Hope with everyone.
subtitles.english: And at the end, I really wanted to sing Rising Hope with everyone.

subtitles.original: So I'm really glad I was able to do that. It was one of my dreams.
subtitles.english: So I'm really glad I was able to do that. It was one of my dreams.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: えっと、Rising Hope とあとゲストパート、いかがでしたでしょうか？
subtitles.english: So, how did you like Rising Hope and the guest medley?

subtitles.original: えっとね、大変あの、光栄なことに...
subtitles.english: Um, I'm very honored that...

subtitles.original: ...JPの先輩にみんなと一緒に、いろんな曲を歌えて...
subtitles.english: ...I was able to sing various songs together with all my JP senpais...

subtitles.original: ...最後はね、あの豪華なキャストで Rising Hope 歌えて...
subtitles.english: ...and at the end, sing Rising Hope with that amazing cast...

subtitles.original: ...本当にそれがね、あの、一つ私の、何て言うの、目標というか願いだったので...
subtitles.english: ...since that was truly one of my goals, or should I say, wishes...

subtitles.original: ...その願いが叶えられてすごく嬉しいです。本当にありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: ...I'm so happy that wish was granted. Thank you all so much!

subtitles.original: Phew! And I think we're at the halfway mark? Yeah!
subtitles.english: Phew! And I think we're at the halfway mark? Yeah!

subtitles.original: And now that we're in the halfway mark, we're also at a different place.
subtitles.english: And now that we're in the halfway mark, we're also at a different place.

subtitles.original: ここはどこでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Where could we be?

subtitles.original: We are at the Seiso Church! Yay!
subtitles.english: We are at the Seiso Church! Yay!

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ清楚なチャー... チャーじゃない、教会にいます。
subtitles.english: I'm at a super seiso chur... not chur, but church.

subtitles.original: Look at these pretty stained glasses! It's so pretty.
subtitles.english: Look at these pretty stained glasses! It's so pretty.

subtitles.original: What kind of seiso song is this seiso Nephilim going to sing?
subtitles.english: What kind of seiso song is this seiso Nephilim going to sing?

subtitles.original: I do not know. No, I do know! I do know, but...
subtitles.english: I do not know. No, I do know! I do know, but...

subtitles.original: I wonder, I wonder. I'm sure you guys are wondering.
subtitles.english: I wonder, I wonder. I'm sure you guys are wondering.

subtitles.original: この清楚な教会でね、この清楚なIRySは一体どんな曲を歌うんでしょうか？
subtitles.english: In this seiso church, just what kind of song will this seiso IRyS sing?

subtitles.original: とても楽しみですね。
subtitles.english: It's very exciting, isn't it?

subtitles.original: では、次の曲を聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Now, please listen to the next song.

subtitles.original: Please listen to my next song.
subtitles.english: Please listen to my next song.

subtitles.original: きらり一瞬の光
subtitles.english: A momentary gleam of light

subtitles.original: 対極する存在達よ さあ
subtitles.english: Oh, opposing existences, come now

subtitles.original: 土へ 未来へ 空へ
subtitles.english: Toward the earth, toward the future, toward the sky

subtitles.original: 接近していく 罪だって
subtitles.english: Approaching, even if it's a sin

subtitles.original: わかっていく 罠だって
subtitles.english: Realizing, even if it's a trap

subtitles.original: 本当なら 密かにあるべきだろう
subtitles.english: In truth, it should probably exist in secret

subtitles.original: 絶望なんて
subtitles.english: Despair and such

subtitles.original: 宿命(さだめ)なんて
subtitles.english: Destiny and such

subtitles.original: 瞳開いて 潮騒聴かせて
subtitles.english: Open your eyes and let me hear the sound of the tide

subtitles.original: そっと抱え込んで
subtitles.english: Gently holding it close

subtitles.original: すっと通り過ぎて
subtitles.english: Quickly passing by

subtitles.original: 裏切り 揺らぎ
subtitles.english: Betrayal, wavering

subtitles.original: Dead or alive and go!
subtitles.english: Dead or alive and go!

subtitles.original: どこに行けば...
subtitles.english: Where should I go...
